idea:
The Wise Blend is a production house based out of Mumbai, India. Our clients include multinational corporations, universities, and training & development companies. We are a one-stop solution to all your content needs and are a committed and seasoned team of production professionals who have worked for some of the finest companies in the world. 

 

TWB is home to 360-degree solutions for audio, video, animation, eLearning, AR & VR, & tech communication. We specialize in the development of training material for eLearning content, LMS development, ad films, audio production, and comprehensive live video production.

idea:
About Us:

A New Age Healthcare Tech Aggregator Platform and Application (app), promoted by a set of buddies with > 70 years of leadership experience in Healthcare and Finance field as well as a young buddy deeply passionate about technology

Promoter team brings deep experience of creating several new age technology based customer journeys aimed to resolve issues faced by consumers as well as service providers

 

Our Vision

To be the best buddy to Healthcare service providers and consumers and assist in providing / availing the best health care services on a real time basis with the help of technology

 

Our Mission

To make affordable healthcare services available to consumers seamlessly while assisting service providers to reduce their operating risks
name: Kurebuddy Private Limited

idea:
Businessjeeto.com is the first online business and life coaching aggregator in India where different trainers can present their recorded and live courses. Business jeeto club membership is the first unique knowledge membership in India which works on learn, Earn and serve model. To learn, users get numerous courses on business & life, free webinars and thousands of business documents along with the membership. To earn you get a license to sell courses to others. You also serve the nation by changing the lives of others. 


This is the first platform that presents courses for Business owners, staff and students together. This is founded by India's top motivational speaker and business coach Dr Ujjwal Patni and various other experts. 


This 24*7 superaffordable high quality knowledge venture works on the motto Ghar baithe India seekhega, business aur life ko jeetega
name: BUSINESS JEETO EDUTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ANNALIE HEALTHCARE LLP  is the among the largest service providers in fertility treatment. We aims to provide advanced Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART) in India on par as to what is available globally. While India has seen a significant rise in the number of patients opting for infertility treatments, the numbers are still abysmally low compared to the couples actually requiring medical treatment. One of the major reasons for this is the lack of awareness. People need to be made aware of the basic concept that infertility is a disease that needs to be addressed medically. In addition to providing core procedures such as IUI, IVF and andragogy services, ANNALIE offers several state-of-the-art technologies such as vitrification for preserving embryos and eggs, embryo scope and ERA ( Endometrial Receptor Array) to find out the timing of the uteruses capacity to accept embryos. All these procedures significantly improve the chances of a pregnancy following IVF and ICSI, even in patients who have had multiple failures previously.
name: ANNALIE HEALTHCARE LLP
